full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LHAG PA'I LHA GANG LA'ANG SBYAR CHOG PA'I SBYIN SREG GI CHO GA SMIN BYED NYI MA'I 'OD ZER ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @035A *, ,(CES LHAG PA'I LHA GANG LA'ANG SBYAR CHOG PA'I SBYIN SREG GI CHO GA SMIN BYED NYI MA'I 'OD ZER ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, NOR BU PHRENG BA'I SBYIN SREG DNGOS GRUB STER BYED DANG, GZHAN DAM PA GONG MAS MDZAD PA'I SBYIN SREG GI CHO GA GZHUNG CHEN MO RNAMS NAS KHA BSKANGS TE, MKHAN MING 'DZIN PA BSAM GRUB BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS SKYABS MGON MCHOG GI GDAN SA CHEN MO DGA' LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE TSUL BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN NO, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN 'GRO YONGS LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
